Functions

Import_Ref_DataFrame

Import reference data for the specified monthly period and parameter classification.

Load_Ref_DataFrames

Load reference data for the parameters measured by the sensors in the passed sensor dataframe list and for the timeframe indicated by sensor dataset timestamps.

Timeframe_Search

Determines the timeframe for which reference data should be loaded.
